name: ecl-report
description: An addon that makes reporting players in ECL (ecl.gg) easier

scripts.build:prod: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run build:content_scripts:prod && npm run remove_export && cp manifest.json dist/.
scripts.build:dev: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run build:content_scripts:dev && npm run remove_export && cp manifest.json dist/.

author: FoseFx <info@fosefx.com>

hooks.pre-push: npm run lint && npm test && npm run build:prod
